name: Thai Natural Homemade Soaps
description: This foamy heart shaped 70 grams handmade soap is made from 100% natural organic ingredients ranging from Thai herbal extracts, 100% authentic essential oils, olive oil, and coconut oil.  No animal testing.  Wrapped in white lace and ribbons or shrouded in silk bags,  they are ideal for gifts and souvenirs, all in one price with no shipping charged.  The products are approved  and certified by the Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) of The Thai Food and Drug Administration.  Your skin is soft, safe, and smell great with authentic oriental tropical fragances. All products are handmade in Thailand.

name: Rose Soap
description: The rose has traditionally been called "Queen of Flowers" and in aromatherapy, rose oil is often thought of as the queen amongst essential oils.  It is used for healing skin infection, relieving tension, depression and insomnia.  It also acts as moisturizing and softening skin agent.  Extraordinarily enriches with Glycerin to moisture your skin.

name: Mangosteen & Roselle Soap
description: The perfect combination of mangosteen and roselle gives you many benefits.  Mangosteen has powerful anti-inflammatory properties, riches in tannin, an antibacteria substance is effective in treating eczematous, and acts as natural deodorant.  Roselle helps promote the growth of new skin cells and reduce irritation.  Extraordinarily enriches with Glycerin to moisture your skin.

name: Banana & Leelawadee
description: Banana riches in VitaminA, B5, C, and E, it provides protection for dry skin while maintaining moisture balance in oily ones.  The gentle scent of leelawadee deeply calms your mind and is helpful for the muscle relaxation.  Great ambrosia for nurturing your precious skin.  Extraordinarily enriches with Glycerin to moisture your skin.

name: Spa Hand Soap
description: These 20 grams handsoaps are perfect for your household use.  Available in many natural authentic scents, they also sooth your skin and best for cleansing your hands.
